animeDescription: Young beaver Chuck's adventure with his little friends. When thy are in trouble, Chuck often asks his father to help them out.  (Source: ANN)
animeStaff: [['Takagaki Kouzou', ['Episode Director']], ['Oosugi Kumiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Tanaka Eiji', ['Animation Director', 'Character Design']], ['Koizumi Shizuo', ['Original Creator']]]
